source.afbb875a:
# import library

import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
source.bc769a45:
# Data Load

train = pd.read_csv(YOUR TRAIN DATA PATH)
test = pd.read_csv(YOUR TEST DATA PATH)
all_data = pd.concat([train, test])
source.77bb6705:
# One-Hot Encoding categorical columns

all_data = pd.get_dummies(all_data)
source.3a2e09db:
# Data Split

train2 = all_data[:len(train)]
test2 = all_data[len(train):]
source.b39f88ce:
# import pycaret
# In this case, I choose regression model! You can change regression to classification in order to your competition

from pycaret.regression import setup, compare_models, blend_models, finalize_model, predict_model
source.8a8ea0fe:
# Setup
# Data preparing

setup(data=train2, target="YOUR TARGET COLUMNS", silent= True)
source.d78e25d2:
# Model Compare

best = compare_models(sort="YOUR COMPETITION'S METRIC", n_select = MODEL_COUNT, fold = K-FOLD COUNT)
source.84ec2a73:
# Blending Model

blended = blend_models(estimator_list= best, fold=fold, optimize=sort)
pred_holdout = predict_model(blended)
source.54a4a988:
# Predict

pred_esb = predict_model(final_model, test2)
result = pred_esb['Label']
source.73a2200d:
# Sub

sub = pd.read_csv(YOUR SUBMISSION FILE PATH)
sub[YOUR COMPETITION'S TARGET] = result
sub.to_csv('sub.csv', index = False)
